laboratory_examinations.findings: TSH levels low (≤0.1 mU/liter; normal range 0.3–5.0).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: TSH levels remained low across subsequent measurements.
FT4 peaked at 1.88 ng/dl at age 11.5 years.
FT3 remained elevated, showing variation in subsequent measurements.
Thyroid volume remained stable at normal size through age 11.
